CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Vertical__c, 'Legal') , SBQQ__Account__r.Lawyers__c , IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Vertical__c , 'Accounting'), SBQQ__Account__r.AnnualRevenue , IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Vertical__c , 'Consulting'), SBQQ__Account__r.AnnualRevenue, IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Vertical__c , 'IB&A'), SBQQ__Account__r.NumberOfEmployees, IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Vertical__c , 'PCM'), SBQQ__Account__r.NumberOfEmployees, null) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Tier Quantity
